base_description: Rectangular sliding window, gray frame, modern style.
part_description: Consists of two main glass panels, vertical alignment. One panel slides horizontally over the other. Gray frame encompasses the panels, with a handle on the sliding panel.
internal_interaction_description: The sliding panel moves horizontally along a track within the frame, allowing it to overlap with the stationary panel. This mechanism enables opening and closing, facilitated by the handle attached to the sliding panel.
external_interaction_description: The window allows light and air to pass through when open, providing ventilation and visibility. It can be opened or closed by a person using the handle, and it fits into a wall opening for installation.
